column4: i have nvu installed and now whenever i open a web page it opens with nvu. how can i change that so webpages are opened by firefox
right click on it
on an html file
so you just started up your computer and it lost sound?
i did that but do i have to do that every time i open an html file
nice
no
go to properties
and go to open with
now click on firefox
ok i did that
now click close
and it should now open in firefox
ok i did that and the default is still nvu i am asking how to change the default to firefox
when i get mail through hotmail and use gaim to open the mail box it is automatically opened by nvu and i hate that
I dont think you followed my directions
right click on an html file
click on properties
and then click on the open with tab
now make sure that the little circle by firefox is highlighted
got it i must have missed some of your typing thank you my friend
